Comments Now Work On Pi Day

14 Mar 2019

Well, there’s not much of a Pi day celeberation (or even mention) on our side of the world.
That’s simply because we go for a DD/MM format rather than peculiar MM/DD format, for dates.
There’s a small irony here, in the sense that the dates for these posts require a YYYY-MM-DD format.

Additionally, I’ve caved into giving an option for comments on all my posts. I’m sure that’ll go swimmingly. Pretty sure.
